title: Lion Water Bottle
description:
Water Bottle developed from Edward Kemeys’ Lion, 1893, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Sustainability with elegance, this water bottle has a powder coated black finish, with a glossy imprint of the Lion across the center. 

  • Size: 16.0 oz.
  • Dimensions: 8.5 x 2.75 in.
  • Materials: 18/8 stainless steel, copper (vacuum insulation)
  • Stainless steel insulated lid.
  • Sweat proof.
  • Keeps cool items cool up to 24 hours, hot ones 10-12 hours.
  • Hand wash recommended.
